question: What is the current number of members of Group of Like-Minded Megadiverse Countries ?
explanation: Megadiverse country is the group of nations that has the majority of Earth's species and high numbers of endemic species. In 1998, it has 17 member countries. Currently it has 20 members i.e. Bolivia, Brazil, China, Colombia, Costa Rica, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Ecuador, Ethiopia, Guatemala, India, Indonesia, Iran, Kenya, Madagascar, Malaysia, Mexico, Peru, Philippines, South Africa, Venezuela.
